2.title: career guidance program
2.des: Yes we conducted another career guidance program in Sri Kalaivani Matric Hr.Sec school Thiruvengadam. The students are really really very energetic and very well disciplined first of all a great thanks to the Correspondent of that school for planning these sessions.

19.title: Motivational program
19.des: Another career guidance session In AVM Hr Sec School,vilampatti delivered by our college correspondent Mrs.Brindha J Ragavan. The students were highly impressive and motivated by our inspirational ideas on higher studies and their importance on career.
